Sentencas: Solid state electrolytes have been intensively studied in the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The aim of this work is to investigate the effects of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical properties of solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-delta (GDC) electrolytes, which are prepared by a sot-gel method with MgO and Fe2O3 addition to the GDC system.
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the addition of MgO and Fe2O3 can reduce the sintering temperature, increase densification and decrease the grain boundary resistance of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The 2 mol% MgO and 2 mol% Fe2O3 co-doped GDC (GDC-MF) exhibits the highest grain boundary conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 400 degrees C, the grain boundary conductivity and total conductivity of GDC-MF are 15.89 times and 5.56 times higher than those of GDC.
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) rate at the electrolyte/cathode interface of GDC-MF is 47 % higher than that of GDC.
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the peak power density of a single cell supported by GDC-MF is 0.45 W cm(-1) at 700 degrees C, 36.7% higher than that of GDC.
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, the GDC-MF should be a promising electrolyte material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of MgO and Fe2O3 dual sintering aids on the microstructure and electrochemical performance of the solid state Gd0.2C0.8O2-δ electrolyte in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
